column2: A new semester begins. You are excited to teach computational linguistics! Your goal is to manage grading and feedback without exhausting yourself. Wanna start grading?
Time to grade student assignments. Be careful with your energy levels! Each grading session consumes 5 Energy Points (EP).
You successfully finished grading. Do you want to go to the first feedback session?
You successfully finished grading. Do you want to go to the second feedback session?
Congrats! you have finished the game. you can check your evaluation.
Unfortunately you lost the game. Wanna give it another try?
